definition: Jingjiang section of the Changjiang River 長江|长江, Hunan
chaste tree or berry (Vitex agnus-castus)/alternative name for the Zhou Dynasty state of Chu 楚國|楚国[Chu3 guo2]

sentences.english: The mechanism of piping and piping failure in Jingjiang Dike foundation is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文探討荊江大堤堤基管湧和管湧破壞的機理。

sentences.english: Jingjiang levees are important to the middle and lower Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 荊江大堤爲長江中下游重要堤防。

sentences.english: Second, the influence of the discharge variation on flood control of Jingjiang River and Dongting Lake is described in the following aspects: 1.
sentences.chinese: 其次全面論述了這種變化對荊江與洞庭湖防洪的影響。

sentences.english: The evaluation on silting rate of Jing River bed in historical times.
sentences.chinese: 歷史阿期荊江河牀淤積速率的評估。

sentences.english: The clogging of relief-wells of Jing Jiang Dyke and its rehabilitation and preventions are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了荊江大堤減壓井的淤堵，修復及預防。
